install.name: Mod Djf Acl
install.author: David Frassi
install.description: Replaces the existent module with a module mapped in com_djfacl policy access control. Instruction: 1) Choose the module you want to protect. Assign Access Level "djfacl" 2) Active mod_djfacl on the same block the other module 3) Assign the module visible for user or group in com_djfacl

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
